PIP
===
Check versions
pip freeze | cut -d = -f 1 | xargs -n 1 pip search | grep -B2 'LATEST:'

Update all
pip install -U `yolk -U | awk '{print $1}' | uniq`
pip freeze --local | grep -v '^\-e' | cut -d = -f 1  | xargs pip install -U

MySQL
=====
easy_install -U distribute 
pip install MySQL-python
